title: Mobile-Based Blended Learning Design and Strategic Implementation (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and knowledge at the level of an introduction to social sciences
context.additional_context: Implementation of blended learning models for social studies in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can complete 80% or more of weekly social issue analysis assignments using mobile platforms.
In blended learning environments, learners achieve a score of 4 or higher on evaluation scales for providing and receiving peer feedback.
Through formative assessments, learners achieve a participation rate of 75% or higher in mobile quizzes and discussion engagement during the learning process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
